thread.title: Kristen
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by Kristen

author: Kristen
title: Kristen
text: The site was easy to use & the training was direct and to the point. You still have to put forth the effort but so long as you dedicate the time and pay attention to each section, you'll do just fine on the final exam. The customer service representatives were very friendly & helpful as well (I accidentally typed in the wrong email address & they fixed it immediately). Given the circumstance, it was a pleasurable experience across the board. I recommend their services!
